title: Event Ticket Font
content:
Please help identify font used in most event tickets - such as the one used in this example. Something close would work. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Grauduation\_08s.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017044202/http:/typophile.com/files/Grauduation_08s.jpg) | 31.25 KB |
author: dwpear

comments.content:
Hi David,

there are a couple of suggestions in these older threads:  
 [Ticket/receipt printer font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017044202/http:/typophile.com/node/9693), [Monospaced dot matrix font on Dodge Music Center ticket](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017044202/http:/typophile.com/node/44124).  
Furthermore: [Thermo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017044202/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Modular+Fonts/Thermo/) by [Lineto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017044202/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lineto).
